content: materials our ** garden gate wrap bundle 1 ** comes in two sizes and contains all the yarn you ll need to make a scarf wrap it includes… - yarn a 2 skeins of purl soho s cattail silk 2 100% mulberry silk each skein is 618 yards/100 grams approximately 815 1210 total yards required we used the color blue bamboo - yarn b 2 3 skeins of purl soho s line weight 3 100% merino wool each skein is 494 yards/100 grams approximately 845 1255 total yards required we used the color clear sky or create your own palette just pick up 2 3 skeins of line weight 4 and 2 skeins of cattail silk 5 to make your own unique combination you will also need… - us 6 4 mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 6 - a cables stitch holder 7 gauge 21 stitches and 29 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch 26 stitches and 29 row = 4 inches in garden gate pattern sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions 8¾ 13 inches wide x 73 inches long sample we knit the wrap size rachel brockman 8 lives in north carolina where she dabbles in a bit of everything and finds inspiration in anything nature her favorite places and ready-to-wear for rachel knitting serves as a creative outlet a calming tool and something she can turn to whether she wants to tackle a challenge or to enjoy the simplest of stitches all images ©️ copyright purl soho for more information see https //www purlsoho com/create/2024/04/05/garden-gate-wrap/ 1 https //www purlsoho com/garden-gate-wrap-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/cattail-silk html 3 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 4 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 5 https //www purlsoho com/cattail-silk html 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 7 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 8 https //www instagram com/rachbrocknits/
